column1: 711715,Weaving Machine Operator,,"Operate textile or leather cutting or production equipment
column3: Cut fabrics, textiles, leather or hide
column7: Inspect textile, hide or leather products
column9: Inspect garments, fabrics or textile products for defects, damage or stains
column11: Feed materials or products into or through equipment
column15: Watch equipment in operation to detect malfunctions
column17: Conduct test runs of production equipment
column21: Program equipment to perform production tasks
column23: Position raw materials on processing or production equipment
column27: Notify others of equipment repair or maintenance needs
column31: Study blueprints or other instructions to determine equipment setup requirements
column37: Set equipment controls to meet cutting specifications
column41: Adjust equipment controls to regulate flow of production
column43: Mount attachments or tools onto production equipment
column45: Install mechanical components in production equipment
column47: Move products, materials or equipment between work areas
column49: Remove products or work pieces from production equipment",0.05192689507712672
